price: 65. Markay koraan doonyaha, waxay baryaan Alle (Keliya), iyagoo u keli yeelaya cibaadada, markase uu nabad ku keeno barriga, markaasay u shariik yeelaan.
arabic: فَإِذَا رَكِبُواْ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ إِذَا هُمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā rakibū fī al-ful'ki daʿawū al-laha mukh'liṣīna lahu al-dīna falammā najjāhum ilā al-bari idhā hum yush'rikūna
